metadata.title: CVE-2017-15996 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: elfcomm.c in readelf in GNU Binutils 2.29 allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (excessive memory allocation) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted ELF file that triggers a "bufferoverflow on fuzzed archive header," related to an uninitialized variable,an improper conditional jump, and the get_archive_member_name,process_archive_index_and_symbols, and setup_archive functions.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
